text: geulihayeo du salam-eun yeohaeng-eul gyesog haneun jung han ma-eul-e ileuleo jumin-ege meog-eul geos-eul guhana geudeul eun geu du salam-eul sonnim-eulo jeobdaeha gileul geojeolhadeola dul-eun mag neom-eojil lyeoneun dam-eul bogo kideuleuga geugeos-eul gochyeose-uni mosega ileugil dang sin-i wonhaessdamyeon dangsin-eun teullim-eobs-i geugeos-e daehan bosang-eul bad-ass-eul geos-i yo hani
